definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

pinyin: Ma3 li4 ya4 na4 Qun2 dao3

definition: Charlotte Amalie, capital of the United States Virgin Islands (USVI)
pinyin: Xia4 luo4 te4 A1 ma3 li4 ya4
Ma3 li4 ya4 na4 hai3 gou1

sentences.english: Ukash Abdi Liban is a Somali refugee who arrived at the camp in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 赖本是1988年来到这个营区的索马利亚人。

sentences.english: What Mary did, then, was counter-cultural.
sentences.chinese: 马利亚所做的，是逆向文化的。

sentences.english: The papers that make it legal were signed at the time of the arrangement of the marriage.
sentences.chinese: 马利亚和约瑟的婚书已在安排婚约时签署。

sentences.english: " What "good news" does the angel Gabriel announce to Mary?
sentences.chinese: 天使加百利向马利亚宣告了什么“好消息”？

sentences.english: The pain of losing her Son was like a sharp and merciless sword piercing Mary's soul.
sentences.chinese: 丧子之痛，像是无情的利刃刺透了马利亚的心。

sentences.english: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping: and as she wept, she stooped down, and looked into the sepulchre
sentences.chinese: 马利亚却站在坟墓外面哭。

sentences.english: So the king died and was brought to Samaria, and they buried him there.
sentences.chinese: 王既死了，众人将他送到撒马利亚，就葬在那里。

sentences.english: The U. N. peacekeeping force was sent to Somalia.
sentences.chinese: 联合国维和部队被送往索马利亚。

sentences.english: Today people who help others are often called Good Samaritans.
sentences.chinese: 今天那些帮助了其他人的人常被称作好撒马利亚人。

sentences.english: Mary, says Jesus, is doing what is better.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣表示，马利亚所作的，才是上好的福分。

sentences.english: Mary of Magdala was the victim of a fearful evil.
sentences.chinese: 抹大拉的马利亚是可怕罪恶的牺牲者。

sentences.english: Mary, of Lazarus , Martha, and Mary, somehow knew Jesus her friend was going to die.
sentences.chinese: 拉撒路和马大的姐妹马利亚知道她的朋友耶稣要受死。

sentences.english: So at that time King Joram set out from Samaria and mobilized all Israel.
sentences.chinese: 那时约兰王出撒马利亚，数点以色列众人。

sentences.english: Everywhere that Mary went, the lamb w …
sentences.chinese: 每一处那圣母马利亚去，羔羊是肯定会去。

sentences.english: With Mary, he risked the wagging tongues of his community.
sentences.chinese: 约瑟要把马利亚娶过来，是要承受旁人的搬口弄舌。

sentences.english: And he reared up an altar for Baal in the house of Baal， which he had built in Samaria.
sentences.chinese: 在撒马利亚建造巴力的庙，在庙里为巴力筑坛。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
John (less common form of 若望[Ruo4 wang4] or 約翰|约翰[Yue1 han4])
